Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne olwa Omwana wa Mariam yachelasibwa (nende Adam) Abandu bo boopa oluyoka
Mana nibaboola mbu: “ Abanyasaye befu shini abalayi okhushila ye tawe? Ne shibakhuchelasilia bario tawe halali amayinji butswa, ne abo ni Abandu bokhusolana
Naye shali nobunyali tawe halali ni Omusumba wakhwahelesia tsimbabaasi mana nikhumukhola eshilolelo khubana ba
Ne khwenyanga khwakharerere Abamalaika khushialo nibaloondana
Ne toto ye (yesu) ni eshimanyisio shieyinyanga yeyindukho. mulakanakana tawe, ne munoonde khwo, ino niyo injila ingolofu
Ne Shetani alabekalila tawe, toto ye ni Omusuku wenyu owa habulafu
Ne olwa Yesu yetsa nende ebifune biahabulafu, yaboola mbu: “ abeetsele nende amachesi nende okhubenoosilia kalia akamukabukhanangamwo, kho murie Nyasaye mana muwulile.”
Toto Nyasaye niye Omulesi wanje nende Omulesi wenyu, kho mumulaame sa yenyene ino niyo injila ingololofu
Mana emikanda nichikabukhana abeene khubeene, abaane khubalia bakhola amabii khushinyasio shieyinyanga indulu
Koo shina shiabaliindanga, halali indukho iliitsa mubwifisi nabo nibalamanyile tawe
Abeetsa inyanga eyo baliba Abasuku, abeene khubeene, halali balia abaria Nyasaye
Enywe Abasumba banje, shimulaba noburi inyanga yino tawe , neshimulabeelela tawe
Balia Abasuubila ebimanyisio biefu mana nibelekhuula khu Nyasaye. (nibaba abasalamu)
Injile mwikulu enywe nende abakhaye benyu musangasibwemwo
Balibotokhanilibwa ebisanda nende ebikaye bie idhahabu, ne bilibamwo bia omwoyo kwikomba nende ebisangasia tsimoni, ne enywe mulimenyamwo tsinyaanga tsioosi
Eyo niyo mwikulu (janna) amulihebwa khukamwakholanga
Mulibaamwo nende ebiamo ebinji biamulilia
Toto abetsimbi baliba mushinyasio shia Jahannam tsinyanga tsioosi
Shibalihulusibwa khushinyasio esho tawe, ne omo baliwesiakhwo omwoyo. (okhurulamwo)
Ne shikhwabakholela amabii tawe halali boo abeene nibo bali abamabii
Ne balikhupa oluyoka nibalanga: “ewe Malik! Boolela Nyasaye wuwo akhufwisie’’ naye alibaboolela mbu: “enywe toto omo butswa nimwamulamenya.”
Toto khwabetsela nende obwatoto halali obunji bwenyu mwali mwakhaya obwatoto
Nohomba babusia amalako kabu, ne toto nefwe babusinjia
Nohomba baparanga mbu efwe shikhuwulilanga akobwifisi nende kokhumonyana kabu tawe? Eeh tawe, abarumwa befu bali ninabo bahandikanga kabakholanga
Boola mbu: “ Nyasaye abetsanga nende Omwana nesie wakhabeele weyimbeli okhumulaama.”
Ni woluyali Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo, Nyasaye Omulesi weshisaala, khu koosi kabamureetsangakhwo
Ne baleshe bokoyaane nibabaya okhula shinga balinyoolana nende inyanga yabalakwa
Naye niye Nyasaye uli mwikulu nende Nyasaye uli mushialo naye niye Omuchesi Omumanyi muno
Ni woluyali ulia owuli nobwami bwomwikulu nende mushialo nende biosi bilimwo, ne niye uli nobumanyi bwebise bieyindukho ne ewuwe ni amulikalusibwa
Ne abamulaamanga abalali ye babula obunyali bwokhubasabila Omundu eshileshelo. Halali ulia wobuloli bwatoto nabo bamanya
Nenobareeba mbu niwina wabaloongabo, ? toto bweene balaboola mbu ni: “ Nyasaye” kho ni hena abakalukhanibungwa
Ne okhuboola khukhwe (Omurumwa) mbu : “Nyasaye wanje Omulesi bano ni Abandu balasuubila tawe.”
Baleshele ne obaboolele amakhuwa komuleembe. Baliitsa okhumanya

Nditsuba khushitabu shinoosinjia
Toto	efwe	khwashishia	mushilo shietsikhabi, toto efwe khuli abekanyilisi
Toto ishilo esho buli likhuwa eliamachesi linoosibungwa
Likhuwa lirula khwifwe toto efwe nefwe Abaruma
Tsimbabaasi okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi, toto ye ni Omuwulili Omumanyi muno
Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo nende biosi bili hakari wabio, toto nimuli mbu enywe muli nende obwatieli
Abulaho Nyasaye wundi tawe halali Ye, alamusinjia ne afwisinjia Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi nende Owabasenywe beyimbeli
Halali bo bali mutsinganakani babayanga
Kho linda inyanga yelikulu liakharusie omwosi kulolekha
Kulifunikha Abandu, shino ni eshinyasio eshilulu
Nyasaye Omulesi wefu, khuyiniliekhwo eshinyasio toto efwe nibasuubila
Okhwitsulila khwabu khubakhoonya shina bulano, ne toto Omurumwa Omwinoosia yamala okhubeetsela
Mana nibamukalukhanilia obweni, nibaboola mbu: “ uno yechesibwa, naye ni Omulalu.”
Toto efwe khwitsa okhuyiniaho eshinyasio hatiti, netoto enywe mulakalukha shinga mwali
Inyanga yakhulikhupa eshikhupo eshikhongo toto efwe khulibarunga
